text: I had a great experience with Dr. Daniel Wong during my recent visit. He was incredibly patient, taking the time to listen to my concerns and explaining my plantar issue in detail. The recovery process was smooth and I really appreciated his professionalism and the care he showed throughout my visits. Highly recommend Dr. Wong for anyone seeking expert podiatry care!

The entire experience from the reception to seeing Dr. Daniel was incredibly comforting. I was a bit nervous about the treatment since I’m afraid of pain, but Dr. Daniel was very gentle and always explained what he was doing, reassuring me along the way to help calm my nerves. The nurse was also so kind, staying by my side and helping me feel less scared. I truly appreciate the care and service they provide to their patients.

My experience here is nothing short of professional. Mr Benedict who treated my ingrown toenails was friendly, fast and efficient. The receptionist was also friendly and helpful. Post the procedure, they offered good follow up reviews to ensure a smooth recovery. While it’s not a cheap procedure, I would recommend Straits Podiatry for professional treatment.

I did my ingrown toenail surgery with Dr Benedict and it has been a pleasant experience. Although I had to travel the day after the surgery, Dr Benedict always keep in touch to monitor my healing & provided precise instructions for the aftercare. It is a wise decision to engage Dr Benedict as he is genuinely concerned about his patients. Never regretted my decision to go with Straits Podiatry!

Mr Jackie is very professional and friendly.
My knee pain has been troubling me for 1 year+  and was affecting my daily activities.  Jackie did some assessments before recommending me the treatment that needed.
Each treatment was a pleasant experience where he showed his patience and understandings.  His confidence motivated me that I would recover and back to my routine lifestyle, and he delivered the results.
Today, I am very grateful that I am back to hiking / trekking activities.
Thank you, Jackie.  Highly recommended for his service and expertise.
